vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Isa.8.1;
son of: Isaiah (H3470A);
brother of: Shear-jashub (H7610)
§ Mahershalalhashbaz = Maher-shalal-hash-baz "swift is booty, speedy is prey"
symbolic name given by Isaiah by the Lord's direction to Isaiah's son; prophetic indication that Damascus and Samaria were soon to be plundered by the king of Assyria
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo del profeta Isaías; "rápido para el pillaje, pronto para el botín"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪黑珥沙拉勒哈施罷斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 「擄掠速臨、搶奪快到」
耶和華吩咐以賽亞給兒子取的象徵性名字;
大馬色和撒馬利亞即將為亞述王所掠奪的預兆
( 賽 8:1,3,4)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛黑珥沙拉勒哈施罢斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 「掳掠速临、抢夺快到」
耶和华吩咐以赛亚给儿子取的象征性名字;
大马色和撒马利亚即将为亚述王所掠夺的预兆
( 赛 8:1,3,4)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Gloss: 瑪黑珥沙拉勒哈施罷斯
vocabInfos._zh_Gloss: 玛黑珥沙拉勒哈施罢斯
